control.name: Responsive drop down
control.helpHtml: A version of the dropdown control that offers responsive design. This control will alter its size based on the parent control it is in, as well as alter to suit the screen size it is viewed on.

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Form summary label
property.helpHtml: Summary label to appear at the end of the form. Leave blank to have the control and its value hidden.

property.name: Options
property.helpHtml: Defines what the dropdown will contain. An option for enabling codes can also be used. Codes allow for more precise visibility and validation conditions.

property.name: Initial value
property.helpHtml: Selects one of the options from the dropdown as its initial value.
